title: Develop new methods for functional annotation and downstream analysis of genetic interaction signals
impactText: Not yet. I am profiling local interactions in a disease traits and will try to develop a new proposal based on this idea to bridge statistical and functional interactions
findingsText:
Interactions between neighbouring markers are useful indicators of regulatory mechanisms underlying complex traits. Further studies of additional complex traits following the protocol developed. 
To develop a new grant bridging statistical and functional interactions Agriculture, Food and Drink,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
